original: Dassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati
analyzed: dassanena pahātabba hetukam dhammam paṭicca na dassanena pahātabba hetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati

original: hetupaccayā. Dassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanadassanena pahātabbahetuko
analyzed: hetu paccayā dassanena pahātabba hetukam dhammam paṭicca nana dassanena pahātabba hetukaḥ

original: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: hetuyā nava ārammaṇe cha adhipatiyā pañca pe vipāke ekam pe avigate nava
